Truly not to be missed by anyone. Just the fact that this very successful business is family owned and operated is a thrill. Seeing the chef sitting in one of the booths with his family as we left - gave me such a good feeling because not only was the entire dinner a success there was obviously a lot of passion for what they did. The way they conduct their service is very upscale. Be sure to make a reservation and remember to allow time for a proper Spanish meal.
